articles.title: B.C. lumber industry on edge after Biden ups the ante on Buy American policies - BC News - Castanet.net
articles.description: British Columbia's lumber industry is anxiously parsing U.S. President Joe Biden's latest Buy American language to better understand the implications for Canadian exporters.

articles.title: Legendary songwriter Burt Bacharach dead at 94 - News24
articles.description: Legendary American pop composer Burt Bacharach, whose prolific output provided a chart-topping playlist for the 1960s and 70s with hits like "I Say a Little Prayer," has died in Los Angeles aged 94, US media said Thursday.
articles.content:
• Composer Burt Bacharach has died at the age of 94.
  • Bacharach worked with stars such as Dionne Warwick, Aretha Franklin, Dusty Springfield and Tom Jones.

articles.title: Chinese military behind spy balloon: U.S. - CTV News
articles.description: China's balloon shot down by the U.S. was equipped to collect intelligence signals as part of a huge, military-linked aerial spy program that targeted more than 40 countries, the Biden administration said Thursday, citing imagery from American U-2 spy planes.
articles.content:

articles.title: Amplats CEO warns investor payouts will decline as load shedding continues to hit SA - News24
articles.description: Anglo American Platinum, the No. 1 platinum miner by value, said investor payouts will drop as worsening power outages in South Africa curb output and push up costs.
